org.epochx.life
Interface ElitismListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ElitismAdapter
public interface ElitismListener

Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle elitism events. See the ElitismManager's class documentation for details of when each elitism event will be fired. To listen for elitism events during execution of a model, instances of ElitismListener must be added to the model's LifeCycleManager which is retrievable through a call to the model's getLifeCycleManager() method.

It is typical to listen to events using an anonymous class which often makes the abstract ElitismAdapter class more convenient to implement.

See Also:
ElitismAdapter, ElitismManager

Method Detail

onElitismStart

void onElitismStart()
Event fired before the elitism operation starts.

onElitism

java.util.List<CandidateProgram> onElitism(java.util.List<CandidateProgram> elites)
Event fired after the elitism operation has been carried out. The elites may be modified and returned to be used, but it is not possible to (nor does it make sense to) revert elitism.

Parameters:
elites - the selection of chosen elites.
Returns:
a list of CandidatePrograms to use as the set of elites. Note that it is not appropriate to return a value of null and this will cause undefined behaviour.

onElitismEnd

void onElitismEnd()
Event fired after the crossover operation has ended and been accepted.
